name: Spaceship Alone
description:
Description:

(This version provides an experience of the prologue part of Spaceship Alone.)

Spaceship Alone is a narrative adventure game in which players will become excellent scouts Medea to find out the unknown cause of the power outage and to resolve it. Interact with NPCs in the dark and eerie atmosphere of Sci-Fi spaceship, find clues to the cause, and survive invisible threats. Interact with as many NPCs as possible! Their response will give a hint to your next path. Some of their response will change depends on you quest progress.

In this game, my interactive storytelling development skills such as interactivity, usability, environmental storytelling, three-dimensional character development, cinematography, creating spaces that exist even without players, etc. will be demonstrated.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Camera POV move: mouse

Interaction: Space Bar

Open the journal/quest log: J key

Next Conversation/ Dialogue Option selection: Mouse Click

Quit the game: not implemented yet, please Alt + F4

Credits

  • Character modelings from Mixamo.com
  • Dialogue System by Pixel Crusher
  • Scene Map "3D Free Modular Kit" by Barking dog from Unity Asset Store
  •  Decorative objects of "Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack" by karboosx from Unity Asset Store
  • Vending machines by VIS Games from Unity Asset Store
  • Extra Particle Pack by Unity from Unity Asset Store
  • PickUp SFX by TreasureSounds from freesound.org
  • BGM by zagi2 from freesound.org
